elements.content:
<form style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 10px;">
                <input type="text" placeholder="Name" style="padding: 5px;">
                <input type="email" placeholder="Email" style="padding: 5px;">
                <button type="submit" style="padding: 5px; background-color: rgb(160, 137, 112); color: rgb(241, 227, 198); border: none;">Submit</button>
            </form>
